amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of any funds for the Commodity Credit Corporation's market promotion program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 29 in the Congressional Record of July 13, 1995, to prohibit any funding appropriated in the bill from being used to pay salaries of personnel who carry out the Commodity Credit Corporation's market promotion program.

action.text: On agreeing to the Zimmer amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 261 (Roll No. 550).
